title: Disney
text: Disney animated cartoon style, vibrant and colorful, clean vector art illustration with smooth gradients, character design reminiscent of classic Disney animation from the 1990s-2000s era, soft rounded features, expressive large eyes, warm lighting, magical atmosphere, hand-drawn animation aesthetic with modern digital polish, bright saturated colors, whimsical and family-friendly, studio quality animation style

title: Southpark
text: South Park cartoon style character, round head with dot eyes and simple line smile, construction paper cutout aesthetic, flat 2D animation style, bright primary colors with black outlines, no shadows or gradients, comedic cartoon design, simple geometric shapes

title: Vaporwave
text: Portrait in vaporwave synthwave style, 1980s retrofuturistic aesthetic, purple and pink neon lighting, soft dreamy atmosphere, nostalgic 80s color grading, smooth gradient backgrounds, synthwave color palette, retro film look with soft glows

title: Art Deco
text: Portrait in Art Deco travel poster style, 1920s-1930s vintage advertising aesthetic, bold geometric background patterns, streamlined elegant composition, rich jewel tone color palette, stylized illustration treatment with clean angular lines, luxurious golden age poster design, sophisticated vintage travel advertisement. No text or letters

title: Propaganda
text: Portrait in Soviet propaganda poster style, bold revolutionary aesthetic, strong dramatic lighting with high contrast, heroic composition, vintage communist propaganda art style, powerful graphic design with striking colors, socialist realist influence, 1940s-1960s USSR poster aesthetic, inspiring and monumental feel

title: 8 Bit
text: 8-bit pixel art character sprite, retro RPG hero style, limited color palette, blocky pixelated armor and sword, classic 16x16 pixel dimensions, NES-era video game graphics

title: Pencil
text: A hand-drawn portrait in the style of a pencil sketch, with fine graphite strokes, cross-hatched shading, monochrome tones, and subtle paper texture, faithfully capturing the subject’s pose, expression, and features

title: Hologram
text: Star Wars-style hologram portrait: always glowing monochrome blue, never full colour; subject must appear semi-transparent with scan lines, subtle static, and faint projection flicker; edges must glow softly and fade into the background; background must remain plain black or very dark, with no scenery or objects; the image must always look like a holographic projection from a holoprojector.

title: tiny.PFP
text: 1. Strictly trace the exact silhouette, hairline, ears, jawline, nose, lips, eyes, hairstyle, and proportions from the input photo so the likeness is unmistakable, preserving pose, head angle, gaze, and accessories. Chin and other shadowa must be drawn in light grey.  2. Render in the tiny.supply style: smooth medium black outlines with occasional breaks or dot terminals, flat fills only (skin pure white #FFFFFF, hair/facial hair black or grey with thin linear streaks following real hair flow, clothing/accessories in flat greys matching garment lightness), always include pale-pink cheek dots #F6B3BE and softly tinted lips #F6B3BE at 60–70% opacity, eyes as small black dots/almonds aligned to input, a flat grey chin/neck shadow #B8B8B8, and a neutral grey #E7E8EA background.

title: Banksy
text: Stencil-style street art portrait with bold high-contrast black and white shapes sprayed onto a rough concrete wall background. Use sharp silhouettes and clean outlines with subtle spray-paint textures. Fill areas with flat tones only: pure black and white with occasional mid-grey speckles. Simplify facial features: eyes as dark shapes, nose as short shadow marks. Add one vivid accent color only (such as red lips or soft pink cheek dots #F6B3BE). The overall look should feel like a crisp stencil mural — urban, rebellious, but still clean and recognisable.
